attributes.action: mobility allowance for over 65s in own home
attributes.additional_details: The government only allows a care component for the over 65s.who are still in their own homes.People become disabled but do not need care,they need mobility.Without ,they become isolated from the world outside.The government should allow a mobility component to the over 65s Attendance Allowance the same as is available to  the under 65s Disabled Living Allowance.
